name: william
text: The cats were so excited they drove 240mph the rest of the trip.

name: antsama
text: I believe it.

name: alejandroadam
text: A comment left by alejandroadam was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Nasir, king_of_pwns, VictoriaW)

name: centipede_damascus
text: I love the Italian BMT so much it hurts sometimes. In my stomach.

name: equinn2006
text: Parmesan oregano bread is the best they have

name: gazdatronik
text: Yes I get double meat double cheese BMT's, evtra mayonnaise. The sandwich would weigh 5 pounds. I am going to die soon.

name: greenkoolayd
text: its funny how, they advertise their sandwiches as part of a good diet and low in calories and stuff, but when people go and put extra this and extra that on, it ends up being no better than a triple whopper.

name: delzhand
text: Is such a good sandwich, Beef.

name: acefalco
text: Is SO good.

name: zem
text: Banned in six states.

name: overmedicated
text: 'hold on to your hangover' is the closest thing to a vocal meme I possess.

name: stuart
text: Speaking of "hang on", note the Galaxie does not have seatbelts.

name: darthemed
text: Unless they're of the waist variety you sometimes find in older cars.

name: atmus
text: I've seen two 1965 Galaxies, both had lap-belts.

name: i_love_kate
text: Case closed!

name: tttt
text: this strip punishes

name: tombsgrave
text: Incidentally, Baked Lay's are freaking delicious.

name: tekende
text: They taste like Pringles. It's kind of weird.

name: saulbellow
text: Man you are really mucking through the past here.  This strip is 5 and a hal fyears old, tombsgrave's comment is a year old, and he hasn't posted anything in three months.

name: fineoakstructure
text: This doesn't change the fact that Bakes Lay's are basically Pringles in a bag.

name: tekende
text: I feel it's important people know this.

name: greenkoolayd
text: you did all that research and math for what reason?  you honkies have strange cares, i tell you....

name: drskradley
text: SIX DAMN STATES MAN

name: ricnine
text: I am enjoying the sub from panel 3 right now. It punishes.

name: laserblade
text: I like how Bakersfield is "abroad".

name: belgand
text: It's much more polite than "middle of nowhere". Hell, from up here in SF Palo Alto is basically a distant place that may or may not exist and I'm in no hurry to find out.

name: greenkoolayd
text: bakersfield is abroad and LA is a straight-up whore.

name: drago25
text: I really want to punish an Italian BMT now but I'm broke. Gee thanks, Beef.

name: greenkoolayd
text: too broke for a $5/footlong?  if you have paypal, ill spot you the cash, dude.  retards shouldnt pay to eat.

name: echidnaboy
text: The motion lines in the last panel effectively convey that the car is traveling at approximately 3x Delorean speed.

name: cbtbone
text: Aha!  Now we know how they made it back so fast.  They must have borrowed the flux capacitor from Lie Bot.

name: puguglypress
text: Subway sounds SO GOOD, even though I have balogna and bread at home and it's basically the same thing

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
except you might smile while you make it.

it would not so at Subway .
